meanings.definition: Fifty times as great or as numerous.
meanings.sent1: The tiny plant grew fiftyfold in size after a week of rain.
meanings.sent2: The population of the town increased fiftyfold during the summer festival.
meanings.sent3: The cat's curiosity grew fiftyfold when it saw a mouse run by.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement at winning the game multiplied fiftyfold when she realized she had also broken a record.
meanings.sent5: The old house's charm increased fiftyfold with the addition of colorful flowers in the garden.

meanings.definition: To increase or be increased fifty times.
meanings.sent1: He hoped to fiftyfold his savings by investing wisely.
meanings.sent2: The company's profits fiftyfolded after the new product launch.
meanings.sent3: The chef's joy fiftyfolded when he received a five-star review from a food critic.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed fiftyfolded when she faced a challenging obstacle.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's speed fiftyfolded as he sprinted towards the finish line.
